column5: Real CCTV footage of the ferry service to the Shetland Isles off the north coast of Scotland.    <iframe width="420" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/pJO85YmU-M0" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
Reminds me of a ferry ride I had from Kangaroo Island to Cape Jervis Australia. It was impossible to even walk. Never seen so many sick people in my life.
Maybe the ferry company should invest in bolting the furniture down  That would not be a fun ride for anyone
I hear the North Sea can get a little choppy at times.
Wow, that one woman really knocks herself out on that one pillar
Thats the part i burst out laughing!  :rofl2:
